mapper.select: SELECT p.pid, p.category, p.pname, p.intro, p.district, p.meeting_area, p.start, p.end, concat(rs.skill_1, ',', rs.skill_2, ',', rs.skill_3, ',', rs.skill_4,',', rs.skill_5, ',', rs.skill_6, ',', rs.skill_7, ',', rs.skill_8, ',', rs.skill_9,',', rs.skill_10) skills, rp.title, rp.rbno, rp.recruit_hits, rp.rcstart, rp.rcend, group_concat(mpp.part separator ',') parts FROM pentacore.project p, pentacore.required_skill rs, pentacore.recruit_project rp, pentacore.manage_project_part mpp WHERE p.pid = rs.pid and rs.pid = rp.pid and p.pid = mpp.pid Group by pid Order by rp.rbno desc Limit 0, 10

SELECT p.pid, p.category, p.pname, p.intro, p.district, p.meeting_area, p.start, p.end, concat(rs.skill_1, ',', rs.skill_2, ',', rs.skill_3, ',', rs.skill_4, ',', rs.skill_5, ',', rs.skill_6, ',', rs.skill_7, ',', rs.skill_8, ',', rs.skill_9, ',', rs.skill_10) skills, rp.title, rp.rbno, rp.recruit_hits, rp.rcstart, rp.rcend, group_concat(mpp.part separator ',') parts FROM pentacore.project p, pentacore.required_skill rs, pentacore.recruit_project rp, pentacore.manage_project_part mpp WHERE p.pid = rs.pid and rs.pid = rp.pid and p.pid = mpp.pid
AND
p.district Like concat('%',#{district},'%')
Group by pid Order by rp.rbno desc

SELECT p.pid, p.category, p.pname, p.intro, p.district, p.meeting_area, p.start, p.end, concat(rs.skill_1, ',', rs.skill_2, ',', rs.skill_3, ',', rs.skill_4, ',', rs.skill_5, ',', rs.skill_6, ',', rs.skill_7, ',', rs.skill_8, ',', rs.skill_9, ',', rs.skill_10) skills, rp.title, rp.rbno, rp.recruit_hits, rp.rcstart, rp.rcend, group_concat(mpp.part separator ',') parts FROM pentacore.project p, pentacore.required_skill rs, pentacore.recruit_project rp, pentacore.manage_project_part mpp WHERE p.pid = rs.pid and rs.pid = rp.pid and p.pid = mpp.pid and rp.rbno <= #{rbno} and rp.rbno > #{rbno} - 10 Group by pid Order by rp.rbno desc
